cu.explanation_en: Setting the remote SCTP data port to an out-of-range value 99999 will cause F1-D interface connection failures and prevent F1AP data message exchange with the DU.

du.explanation_en: Setting the minimum receive/transmit time to an invalid value of 99 will cause timing configuration errors and prevent proper frame synchronization in the DU.
du.explanation_zh: 將最小接收/傳輸時間設定為無效值 99 會導致時間配置錯誤，並阻止 DU 中的正確幀同步。
